mapper.select: SELECT grade_level AS level, COUNT(*) AS levelNum , classId AS id, grade, class_num FROM ( SELECT STU.id, C.id AS classId, C.grade,C.class_num, CASE WHEN AVG(final_sco*final_por*0.01 + mid_sco*mid_por*0.01 + usual_sco*usual_por*0.01) >= 90 THEN '优秀' WHEN AVG(final_sco*final_por*0.01 + mid_sco*mid_por*0.01 + usual_sco*usual_por*0.01) >= 80 THEN '良好' WHEN AVG(final_sco*final_por*0.01 + mid_sco*mid_por*0.01 + usual_sco*usual_por*0.01) >= 70 THEN '中等' WHEN AVG(final_sco*final_por*0.01 + mid_sco*mid_por*0.01 + usual_sco*usual_por*0.01) >= 60 THEN '及格' ELSE '不及格' END AS grade_level FROM score_info AS S JOIN choose_course AS CH ON S.choose_id = CH.id JOIN stu_info AS STU ON STU.id = CH.stu_id JOIN class_info AS C ON STU.class_id = C.id GROUP BY STU.id ) AS subquery GROUP BY grade_level,classId,class_num
